title: [Massive] Innovative Nursing Education Design Leveraging Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing management and leadership concepts, basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Online real-time education in smartphone-limited tech environments with summative assessment-based learning outcome measurement

learning_goals: Learners can design a digital technology integration plan suitable for nursing education scenarios by applying the ASSURE model.
Learners can plan two or more educational activities using smartphone-based digital tools (e.g., nursing simulation apps, real-time collaboration platforms).
Learners can develop a comprehensive summative assessment tool to evaluate the effectiveness of digital education for large learner groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
